id.description: Uniquely identifies this porting phone number block.

country_code.description: Specifies the country code for this porting phone number block. It is a two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

phone_number_type.description: Specifies the phone number type for this porting phone number block.

phone_number_range.description: Specifies the phone number range for this porting phone number block.

start_at.description: Specifies the start of the phone number range for this porting phone number block.

end_at.description: Specifies the end of the phone number range for this porting phone number block.

activation_ranges.description: Specifies the activation ranges for this porting phone number block. The activation range must be within the phone number range and should not overlap with other activation ranges.

start_at.description: Specifies the start of the activation range. Must be greater or equal the start of the phone number range.

end_at.description: Specifies the end of the activation range. It must be no more than the end of the phone number range.

record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was last updated.
